page.title: 09HOME-LIFE, CWMBRAN
page.content: During the week my family get-up between 7 a.m. and 8 a.m.We don't always have breakfast together because Mum goes to work at 8.30.a.m.and Dad works shifts.For breakfast we have cereal,toast and tea.Afterwards my brother and I dress and leave for school.School starts at 9.15.When the bell rings we go to the hall for Assembly.Our Headmaster takes the Service.When we return to our classes we do Maths.At 10.30.a.m.we go out to play.My friend and I sell crisps and drinks. At 10.50.we continue with Maths and English until 12.15.This is lunch -time. Some people eat a school-lunch while others bring sand- wiches.We come in at 1.15.p.m.and work until 2.30.at Environmental Studies.We have another break until 2.45.and for the last hour we have Music,Games or P.E.At 3.45.School finishes.
